terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using the Hajz platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.
terms.servicesText: Hajz provides a platform for booking hotels, restaurants, and car rentals across Algeria. We act as an intermediary between users and service providers, facilitating the booking process.
terms.userAccountText: To use certain features of our platform, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.bookingText: All bookings made through Hajz are subject to availability and confirmation by the service provider. Prices displayed are subject to change until a booking is confirmed.
terms.paymentText: Payments are processed securely through our payment partners (Chargily Pay). By making a payment, you authorize us to charge your selected payment method for the total amount of your booking.
terms.cancellationText: Cancellation policies vary by service provider. Please review the specific cancellation policy before completing your booking. Refunds, if applicable, will be processed according to the provider's policy.
terms.liabilityText: Hajz is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our platform or services booked through our platform.
terms.contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at support@hajz.dz

privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect personal information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, phone number, and payment information. We also collect information about your usage of our platform.
privacy.dataUsageText: We use your personal information to process bookings, communicate with you about your reservations, improve our services, and send you marketing communications (with your consent).
privacy.dataProtectionText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our platform, analyze usage patterns, and deliver personalized content and advertisements.
privacy.thirdPartyText: We may share your information with service providers (hotels, restaurants, car rental companies) to fulfill your bookings. We also use third-party payment processors to handle transactions securely.
privacy.userRightsText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also object to certain processing activities and request data portability.
privacy.contactText: For any privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at privacy@hajz.dz
